attributes.action: Allow persons in receipt of Income Support with Disability premium and Disability Living Allowance to receive the £300 winter payment given to over 65's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This past few months oil prices continue to fall, however many companies, including Northern Ireland Electricity, continue to increase their charges disproportionate to the costs. 
Further more, the only media attention for people in fuel poverty are the over 65's, the elderly of the UK have to be the most well looked after age group of their kind in the world, and receive good benefits and allowances including the £300 winter fuel payement, which is of course necessary, however, I the petition creator like many people across the UK cannot work due to severe health problems and it is we who will suffer this winter, and in some cases people may either directly or indirectly die as a result of cold related illnesses. I would like the government to extend its gold standards of care for the vulnerable elderly to the vulnerable of society as a whole, and there after bring these companies into line for extortion on a grand scale.
